metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3981 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: acinclude.m4, as used in the configure script in PHP 5.5.13 and earlier, allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the /tmp/phpglibccheck file.

criterions.comment: lynis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
